column1: S0131.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0131.DECK.  131. SURVEY NUMBER
S0131.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0131.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 8. OTHER 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  01. 18 YEARS OR LESS 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 YEARS 04. 21 YEARS 05. 22 YEARS 06. 23 YEARS 07. 24 YEARS 08. 25 YEARS 09. 26 THROUGH 29 YEARS 10. 30 THROUGH 34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 9. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY? E. SECTION:  01. NEW ENGLAND 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 08. MOUNTAIN 09. PACIFIC 10. FOREIGN, NOT U.S. 11. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE COMING INTO THE ARMY?  1. ON A FARM IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTIONS 6 AND 7 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S0131.Q6. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED, OR WIDOWED? F. IF MARRIED:  Q.7. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY?  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q8. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE?  1. HAVE NO CHILDREN 2. HAVE ONE CHILD 3. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 4. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER
S0131.Q9. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARMY?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. ERC, RAR, ROTC 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q10. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY? E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 3. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q11. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE C-B-I THEATER?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 6. OVER 18 MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q12. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED AT THIS PARTICULAR PLACE?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q13. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU CONSIDER THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER IN THE TOTAL WAR EFFORT?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q14. DO YOU THINK THE HIGH COMMAND CONSIDERS THE CHINA-BURMA- INDIA THEATER MORE IMPORTANT OR LESS IMPORTANT THAN YOU CONSIDER IT IN THE TOTAL WAR EFFORT?  1. THEY CONSIDER IT MORE IMPORTANT THAN I DO 2. THEY CONSIDER IT JUST ABOUT AS IMPORTANT AS I DO 3. THEY CONSIDER IT LESS IMPORTANT THAN I DO 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q15. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW?  1. ENGINEERS OR COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 2. FIELD ARTILLERY OR AIR CORPS 3. QUARTERMASTER CORPS OR TRANSPORTATION CORPS 4. INFANTRY OR ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 5. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT OR CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 6. ARMORED FORCE OR MILITARY POLICE 7. SIGNAL CORPS OR D.E.M.L. 8. FINANCE DEPARTMENT OR OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q16. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH BRANCH OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE IN?  1. ENGINEERS OR COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 2. FIELD ARTILLERY OR AIR CORPS 3. QUARTERMASTER CORPS OR TRANSPORTATION CORPS 4. INFANTRY OR ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 5. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT OR CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 6. ARMORED FORCE OR MILITARY POLICE 7. SIGNAL CORPS OR D.E.M.L. 8. FINANCE DEPARTMENT OR OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q17. DO YOU THINK THAT AFTER THE WAR THE TRAINING YOU ARE GETTING IN THE ARMY WILL OR WILL NOT HELP YOU TO GET A BETTER JOB THAN YOU HAD BEFORE YOU WENT INTO THE ARMY?  1. WILL HELP ME TO GET A BETTER JOB 2. WILL NOT HELP ME TO GET A BETTER JOB 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q18. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP)*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 19 NOT CODED.
S0131.Q20. HOW INTERESTED ARE YOU IN YOUR ARMY JOB?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. A LITTLE BUT NOT MUCH 3. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q21. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANCE?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q22. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NOT?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0131.Q23. DO YOU THINK YOU ARE MAKING GOOD IN THE ARMY?  1. I FEEL PRETTY SURE I AM MAKING GOOD 2. I AM NOT SO SURE I AM MAKING GOOD 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q24. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARMY?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q25. DO YOU CONSIDER YOUR OWN PRESENT JOB OR DUTY IN THE ARMY AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFORT?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q26. DO YOU THINK YOUR COMMANDING OFFICER CONSIDERS YOUR JOB AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFORT?  1. YES, HE CONSIDERS IT IMPORTANT 2. NO, HE DOES NOT CONSIDER IT IMPORTANT 3. I HAVE NO IDEA WHETHER OR NOT HE CONSIDERS IT IMPORTANT 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q27. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRITS?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q28. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSET?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q29. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE IN?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT STATIONED IN THE UNITED STATES 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q30. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JOB?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q31. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JOB?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. DISSATISFIED 5. VERY DISSATISFIED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q32. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY JOB WHERE YOU BEST FIT?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q33. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN DO?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q34. DO YOU CONSIDER THE JOB YOUR OUTFIT IS DOING AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFORT?  1. VERY IMPORTANT 2. PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q35. HOW MANY OF YOUR OFFICERS WOULD YOU SAY CONSIDER THE JOB YOUR OUTFIT IS DOING AN IMPORTANT ONE IN THE WAR EFFORT?  1. ALL OF THEM CONSIDER IT IMPORTANT 2. MOST OF THEM CONSIDER IT IMPORTANT 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM CONSIDER IT IMPORTANT 4. ONLY A FEW OF THEM CONSIDER IT IMPORTANT 5. NONE OF THEM CONSIDER IT IMPORTANT 6. DON'T KNOW 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q36. DO YOU THINK A SOLDIER WITH ABILITY HAS A GOOD CHANCE FOR PROMOTION IN THE ARMY?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q37. DO YOU EVER FEEL THAT YOU ARE NOT AS GOOD A SOLDIER AS MOST OF THE OTHER MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT?  1. I FEEL THAT WAY NEARLY ALL OF THE TIME 2. I FEEL THAT WAY FAIRLY OFTEN 3. I FEEL THAT WAY ONLY ONCE IN A WHILE 4. I ALMOST NEVER FEEL THAT WAY 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q38. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q39. ON THE WHOLE, WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE WELL ADJUSTED OR POORLY ADJUSTED TO ARMY LIFE?  1. I AM VERY WELL ADJUSTED 2. I AM FAIRLY WELL ADJUSTED 3. I AM NOT SO WELL ADJUSTED 4. I AM VERY POORLY ADJUSTED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q40. DO YOU EVER WORRY ABOUT HOW WELL YOUR FAMILY IS GETTING ALONG BACK HOME?  1. I DON'T WORRY AT ALL 2. I WORRY A LITTLE BUT NOT MUCH 3. I WORRY PRETTY MUCH 4. I WORRY A LOT 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q41. IF YOU WERE SENT INTO ACTUAL FIGHTING RIGHT NOW, HOW DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO?  1. I THINK I WOULD DO ALL RIGHT 2. I THINK I WOULD HAVE TROUBLE AT FIRST, BUT AFTER A WHILE I WOULD BE O.K. 3. I DON'T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 4. I HAVEN'T ANY IDEA HOW I WOULD DO 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q42. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT AGAINST THE ENEMY?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q43. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER FROM NOW DO YOU GUESS THE WAR WILL LAST WITH GERMANY?  01. LESS THAN ONE YEAR OR JUST 1944 02. ONE YEAR (FEBRUARY OR MARCH 1945) 03. OVER A YEAR BUT LESS THAN TWO OR JUST 1945 04. TWO YEARS 05. OVER TWO YEARS BUT LESS THAN THREE 06. THREE YEARS 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A SHORT TIME 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A LONG TIME 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME 11. DON'T KNOW 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q44. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE GERMANS?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE TOO HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q45. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER FROM NOW DO YOU GUESS THE WAR WILL LAST WITH JAPAN?  01. LESS THAN ONE YEAR OR JUST 1944 02. ONE YEAR (FEBRUARY OR MARCH 1945) 03. OVER A YEAR BUT LESS THAN TWO OR JUST 1945 04. TWO YEARS 05. OVER TWO YEARS BUT LESS THAN THREE 06. THREE YEARS 07. OVER THREE YEARS 08. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A SHORT TIME 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER INDICATING A LONG TIME 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER WITH NO INDICATION OF TIME 11. DON'T KNOW 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q46. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE JAPANESE?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE TOO HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q47. HOW DO YOU THINK THIS WAR WILL COME OUT FOR THE ALLIES?  1. IT WILL BE A COMPLETE MILITARY VICTORY FOR US 2. WE WILL WIN, BUT IT WON'T BE A COMPLETE MILITARY VICTORY 3. IT WILL END IN A DRAW 4. THE OTHER SIDE HAS A PRETTY GOOD CHANCE OF WINNING 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q48. DO YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR IN THE NEXT 25 YEARS OR SO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q49. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WOULD YOU RATHER BE FIGHTING THE GERMANS OR WOULD YOU RATHER BE FIGHTING THE JAPANESE?  1. I WOULD RATHER BE FIGHTING THE GERMANS 2. I WOULD RATHER BE FIGHTING THE JAPANESE 3. IT WOULD NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q50. DO THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP) COOPERATE, AND WORK WELL TOGETHER?  1. ALL OF THE TIME 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. OFTEN DO NOT 4. ALMOST NEVER DO 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q51. HOW MANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY WOULD YOU SAY ARE GOOD ALL-AROUND SOLDIERS?  1. ALL ARE 2. MOST ARE 3. ABOUT HALF ARE, HALF ARE NOT 4. ONLY A FEW ARE 5. ALMOST NONE ARE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q52. DO YOU LIKE TO WORK WITH THE OTHER FELLOWS IN YOUR COMPANY?  1. WITH MOST OF THEM 2. WITH ABOUT HALF OF THEM 3. WITH ONLY A FEW OF THEM 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q53. HOW DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY WOULD SHOW UP UNDER COMBAT CONDITIONS?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. NOT SO WELL 4. POORLY 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q54. DO YOU THINK THAT THE COMPANY PUNISHMENT IN YOUR OUTFIT IS USUALLY FAIR OR UNFAIR?  1. IT IS USUALLY FAIR 2. IT IS USUALLY UNFAIR 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q55. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR PRESENT JOB OR DUTY?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q56. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR REGIMENT? (IF YOU ARE NOT PART OF A REGIMENT ANSWER THIS QUESTION FOR THE LARGEST UNIT TO WHICH YOU BELONG.)  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q57. DO YOU THINK THE PROBLEMS THE UNITED STATES WILL HAVE AFTER THE WAR ARE GETTING TOO MUCH OR TOO LITTLE ATTENTION AT THE PRESENT TIME?  1. THEY ARE GETTING TOO MUCH ATTENTION NOW 2. THEY ARE GETTING ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF ATTENTION NOW 3. THEY ARE GETTING TOO LITTLE ATTENTION NOW 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q58A. DO YOU THINK THAT AFTER THE WAR SOLDIERS IN YOUR OUTFIT WILL ACTUALLY FIND IT EASIER OR HARDER TO GET JOBS THAN THEY DID BEFORE THE WAR?  1. EASIER THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. ABOUT THE SAME AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. HARDER THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q58B. WHAT IS YOUR REASON FOR YOUR ANSWER?  1. DEFINITE ANSWER 2. DON'T KNOW 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q59A. DO YOU THINK THAT THINGS WILL BE BETTER OR WORSE FOR YOU PERSONALLY AFTER THE WAR THAN THEY WERE BEFORE THE WAR?  1. BETTER FOR ME AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. SAME FOR ME AFTER THE WAR AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. WORSE FOR ME AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0131.Q59B. WHAT ARE THE REASONS FOR YOUR ANSWER?  1. DEFINITE ANSWER 2. DON'T KNOW 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q60. WHICH DO YOU THINK ARE THE MOST DANGEROUS TO FIGHT AGAINST, THE GERMANS OR THE JAPANESE?  1. THE GERMANS ARE THE MOST DANGEROUS TO FIGHT AGAINST 2. THE JAPANESE ARE THE MOST DANGEROUS TO FIGHT AGAINST 3. THEY ARE ABOUT THE SAME 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q61. UP TO NOW, HAS THE WAR MADE THINGS BETTER OR WORSE FOR YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS BACK HOME (SUCH THINGS AS JOBS, PAY, AND LIVING CONDITIONS)*  1. THINGS ARE A LOT BETTER 2. THINGS ARE A LITTLE BETTER, BUT NOT MUCH 3. I DON'T SEE ANY DIFFERENCE 4. THINGS ARE A LITTLE WORSE 5. THINGS ARE A LOT WORSE 6. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q62. WOULD YOU SAY THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO THEIR ARMY DUTIES, OR DO THEY USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY?  1. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q63. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR ARMY DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0131.Q64. HOW MUCH OF YOUR DUTY TIME IS USED IN DOING THINGS THAT DO NOT SEEM IMPORTANT TO YOU?  1. A LOT OF IT 2. SOME OF IT 3. ONLY A LITTLE OF IT 4. NONE OF IT 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q65. WHEN YOUR NONCOMS GIVE YOU SOMETHING TO DO, DO THEY TELL YOU ENOUGH ABOUT IT SO THAT YOU CAN DO A GOOD JOB?  1. ALWAYS TELL ME ENOUGH 2. USUALLY TELL ME ENOUGH 3. OFTEN DO NOT TELL ME ENOUGH 4. ALMOST NEVER TELL ME ENOUGH 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q66. WHEN YOUR OFFICERS GIVE YOU SOMETHING TO DO, DO THEY TELL YOU ENOUGH ABOUT IT SO THAT YOU CAN DO A GOOD JOB?  1. ALWAYS TELL ME ENOUGH 2. USUALLY TELL ME ENOUGH 3. OFTEN DO NOT TELL ME ENOUGH 4. ALMOST NEVER TELL ME ENOUGH 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q67. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE NONCOMS THAT HAVE BEEN PICKED FROM YOUR OUTFIT?  1. THEY ARE THE BEST ONES THAT COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 2. THEY ARE AS GOOD AS ANY THAT COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 3. SOMEWHAT BETTER ONES COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 4. MUCH BETTER ONES COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q68. DO YOU EVER FEEL LIKE ASKING THE NONCOMS YOU SERVE UNDER QUESTIONS ABOUT WHY THINGS ARE DONE THE WAY THEY ARE?  1. VERY OFTEN FEEL LIKE ASKING 2. SOMETIMES FEEL LIKE ASKING 3. SELDOM FEEL LIKE ASKING 4. NEVER FEEL LIKE ASKING 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA CARD 2
S0131.CARD.  2. CARD TWO

S0131.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0131.Q69. DO YOUR NONCOMS GIVE YOU A GOOD CHANCE TO ASK QUESTIONS AS TO THE REASON WHY THINGS ARE DONE THE WAY THEY ARE?  1. ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. NOT VERY OFTEN 4. ALMOST NEVER 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q70. HOW MANY OF THE NONCOMS YOU NOW SERVE UNDER ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT TO SERVE UNDER IN COMBAT?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q71. HOW MANY OF THE OFFICERS IN YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP) ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT TO SERVE UNDER IN COMBAT?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER
S0131.Q72. IF YOU HAD A PERSONAL PROBLEM, IS THERE AN OFFICER (NOT COUNTING THE CHAPLAIN) WITH WHOM YOU WOULD FEEL FREE TO TALK ABOUT IT?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0131.Q73. DO YOU THINK THE EQUIPMENT OF THE AMERICAN ARMY IS BETTER OR WORSE THAN THE EQUIPMENT OF THE JAPANESE ARMY?  1. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 2. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 3. OUR EQUIPMENT IS ABOUT THE SAME QUALITY AS THAT OF THE JAPANESE ARMY 4. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 5. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 6. DON'T KNOW 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q74. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS RUN?  1. IT IS RUN VERY WELL 2. IT IS RUN PRETTY WELL 3. IT IS NOT RUN SO WELL 4. IT IS RUN VERY POORLY 5. UNDECIDED 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q75. WHEN YOU GET A VERY IMPORTANT JOB TO DO, DO YOU WORRY ABOUT WHETHER YOU WILL DO ALL RIGHT OR NOT?  1. I WORRY A LOT 2. I WORRY A LITTLE 3. I DON'T WORRY AT ALL 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q76. SUPPOSE YOU WERE WORKING AT YOUR REGULAR ARMY JOB AND A GENERAL YOU HAD NEVER SEEN BEFORE CAME UP AND ASKED YOU QUESTIONS ABOUT WHAT YOU WERE DOING. DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HIM?  1. I'M PRETTY SURE I WOULD MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HIM 2. I'M NOT SURE, BUT I THINK I WOULD MAKE A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HIM 3. I DON'T THINK I WOULD MAKE SUCH A GOOD IMPRESSION ON HIM 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q77. DO TOO MANY OF THE ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS SEEM USELESS TO YOU?  1. NO, I NEVER THOUGHT SO 2. NO, I USED TO THINK SO BUT I DON'T THINK SO NOW 3. YES, TOO MANY SEEM USELESS 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q78. HAVE YOU EVER RECEIVED COMPANY PUNISHMENT WHILE YOU HAVE BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT OUTFIT?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q79. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO MAKE A GOOD RECORD IN THE ARMY?  1. IT IS VERY IMPORTANT 2. IT IS PRETTY IMPORTANT 3. IT IS NOT SO IMPORTANT 4. IT IS NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0131.Q80A. DO YOU THINK THAT SOME OF THE ARMY DRILL OR TRAINING YOU GOT BEFORE YOU CAME OVERSEAS WAS NOT NEEDED TO MAKE YOU A GOOD SOLDIER?  1. YES, MUCH OF IT WAS NOT NEEDED 2. YES, SOME OF IT WAS NOT NEEDED 3. NO, ALL WAS NEEDED 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0131.Q80B. JUST WHAT WAS NOT NEEDED?  1. "EYE WASH" OR "SPIT AND POLISH" 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0131.Q80B. JUST WHAT WAS NOT NEEDED?  187 1. CLOSE ORDER DRILL, MANUAL OF ARMS, GAS MASK DRILL 985 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0131.Q80B. JUST WHAT WAS NOT NEEDED?  14 1. HOUSEKEEPING DUTIES 1158 2. NOT CHOSEN
